ContentType.name: SmartFolder
ContentType.Description: Use smart folders to group information (contents) by Repository query.

Field.name: Query
Field.Description: Please give a query here that you want to use for collecting the children of this smart folder.

Field.name: EnableAutofilters
Field.Description: If autofilters are enabled, system contents will be filtered from the query

Field.name: EnableLifespanFilter
Field.Description: If lifespan filter is enabled, only valid contents will be in the result
